replace_default_agents.description: If true, replaces OpenCode's default agents (plan, build) with only cline-plan and cline-act. If false, adds Cline agents alongside default agents.

default_agent.description: Which agent to use by default when starting OpenCode

plan_model.description: Model to use for cline-plan agent. If not specified, uses the default model from opencode.json

act_model.description: Model to use for cline-act agent. If not specified, uses the default model from opencode.json
